ai-thag2.40:1.1_0: This fellow, “Rag-rice”, he sure is a rag!
ai-thag2.40:1.2_0: Into the vase of the deathless, polished and overflowing,
ai-thag2.40:1.4_0: the path to build up absorptions has been laid out.
ai-thag2.40:2.3_0: For you can’t know merely by name.
ai-thag2.40:2.4_0: when I’m striken by the Saṅgha, I am confused.
ai-thag2.40:2.7_0: The fourth sub-chapter on lying down is finished.
